benchmark_details.name: Matina Corpus
benchmark_details.overview: The Matina Corpus is a new Persian dataset comprising 72.9 billion tokens, carefully preprocessed and deduplicated to ensure high data quality. It addresses the lack of large, diverse datasets for Persian language processing, enhancing training for NLP tasks and general model capabilities.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To advance Persian NLP by providing a large-scale, high-quality corpus for training language models.
purpose_and_intended_users.limitations: Sub-Document Level Redundancies: Redundancies at the sentence or paragraph level exist. Sensitive Content and Language: Some sensitive material remains, particularly in social media data.

data.source: Publicly available datasets, crawled websites, academic papers, and social media.

methodology.calculation: Novel preprocessing and deduplication methods are applied to various content sources to ensure data quality.
methodology.interpretation: Performance of models pre-trained on the Matina corpus shows marked improvements over existing Persian datasets.
methodology.validation: The dataset's usage in training has been validated through performance benchmarks against existing models.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: The dataset includes some sensitive content and informal language from social media, which may not be filtered.
